For more information about install and setup process, please refer to this page: https://github.com/fixator10/Fixator10-Cogs/wiki/Installing-Leveler
description:
Level/Experience tracker
Increase activity (or not) on your server with chat exp!
end_user_data_statement:
This cog persistently stores next data about user:
    Discord user ID
    Current username
    Per-server XP data (current XP and current level)
    Total count of XP on all servers
    URLs to profile/rank/levelup backrounds
    User-set title & info
    User's "reputation" points count
    Data about user's badges
    Data about user's profile/rank/levelup colors
    Timestamp of latest message and reputation
    Last message text (for comparison)
This cog supports data removal requests.
